description:
Scarlet and her friends continue to deal with the external threats, but the source of the problem remains.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: As These Appear Undercooked, May I Turn Them Into Mince Meat?
Parece que no los he asado suficiente. ¿Puedo convertirlos en carne picada?
Yaki Tarinakatta You na no de Isso Mince ni Shite mo Yoroshii Deshouka
焼き足りなかったようなのでいっそミンチにしてもよろしいでしょうか
